subject: Re: [junit] Execution Order
msgSnippet: ... I believe it depends on the order in which the methods are specified in your test class, but I don t usually depend on that. ... If you re adding tests or
messageBody:
huaishih_wen wrote:

> How does junit determine the order of execution for test methods?

I believe it depends on the order in which the methods are specified in
your test class, but I don't usually depend on that.

> How does junit determine the order of execution for test cases added
> to a test suite?

If you're adding tests or suites to suites by hand (with
suite.addTest()), then it's the order in which they were added.

> Does junit execute test methods/test cases swquentially or
> concurrently?

Sequentially.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca

JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
